name: Erin Hannon
summary: Erin Hannon replaces Pam Beasley (Halpert) as the receptionist at Dunder Mifflin Scranton. Erin is cheerful and loves being a receptionist. She is typically positive and supportive of Michael which she demonstrates in the "Nepotism" scene. Erin could be described as the employee who is the least likely to quit her job in search of a better opportunity because she is very content at Dunder Mifflin.
